summary: When his adoptive Japanese-American family is sent to Manzanar after Pearl Harbor, a young Chicano enlists in the marines to become a hero in the Battle of Saipan.
cast: Jeffrey Hunter|David Janssen|Vic Damone|Patricia Owens|Richard Eyer|John Larch|Bill Williams|Michi Kobi|George Shibata|Reiko Sato|Richard Gardner|Bob Okazaki|George Matsui|Nicky Blair|George Takei|Miiko Taka|Tsuru Aoki|Sessue Hayakawa|Frank Gerstle|Paul Togawa
title: Del infierno a la eternidad
